remarks: Splitting for structure powers, part 3: restriction is a module homomorphism.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pwssplit1.y $e |- Y = ( W ^s U ) $.
pwssplit1.z $e |- Z = ( W ^s V ) $.
pwssplit1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwssplit1.c $e |- C = ( Base ` Z ) $.
pwssplit1.f $e |- F = ( x e. B |-> ( x |` V ) ) $.
pwssplit3 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> F e. ( Y LMHom Z ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d U x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d Z x $.
